summary.overview: CAUP is a CICS transaction that provides online account and customer data update functionality for credit card accounts. It allows authorized users to search for accounts, view current account and customer information, make modifications to various data fields, and save validated changes to the database with proper transaction integrity.
business_functions: User Authentication and Session Validation - Verify user credentials and maintain secure session
Account Search and Lookup - Accept account ID input and retrieve account information
Account Data Retrieval - Display current account master data including balances and limits
Customer Data Retrieval - Display associated customer master data and personal information
Data Modification Interface - Allow users to update account and customer information fields
Account Status Management - Validate and update account active status indicators
Credit Limit Management - Validate and update credit limit amounts
Balance Information Updates - Validate and update current and available balance amounts
Date Field Management - Validate and update account dates including open, expiry, and reissue dates
Customer Personal Information Updates - Validate and update customer names, addresses, and contact information
SSN and Date of Birth Validation - Ensure proper format and business rules for sensitive personal data
FICO Score Management - Validate and update credit scores within acceptable ranges
Phone Number and Address Validation - Ensure proper formatting of contact information
State and ZIP Code Validation - Validate geographic information consistency
EFT Account Information Updates - Manage electronic funds transfer account details
Data Change Detection and Confirmation - Compare original vs modified data and confirm changes
Concurrent Update Protection - Prevent data conflicts from simultaneous user updates
Transaction Commit Processing - Save validated changes to account and customer records
Error Handling and User Feedback - Display validation errors and guide user corrections
Menu Navigation and Program Flow - Handle user navigation between different application functions

CAUP.program_overview: Main account update program that handles account and customer data modifications
Main menu interface for regular users with navigation and access control
User authentication and sign-on screen with credential validation
Administrative menu interface for admin users with elevated privileges

datasource_summary.name: User Security File (USRSEC)
datasource_summary.function: User security file used to authenticate user credentials by reading user ID and password information

datasource_summary.name: Account Master File (ACCTDAT)
datasource_summary.function: Account master file for reading and updating account records including balances, limits, dates, and status information

datasource_summary.name: Customer Master File (CUSTDAT)
datasource_summary.function: Customer master file for reading and updating customer records including personal information, addresses, and phone numbers

datasource_summary.name: Card Cross-Reference Account Index File (CXACAIX)
datasource_summary.function: Card cross-reference account index file used for lookup operations to find customer ID and card number by account ID
